alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 10:19PM CDT until June 24 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1019 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Moorefield to 6 miles northwest of Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area to 6 miles north of Danbury, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Curtis, Eustis, Moorefield, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Orafino, Freedom and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
